name: Hexapong (jwilsonmelo15)
description:
Hi, This is one of my first games that I "finished". It's a self ping pong game with a hexagon being the focus. Try to get a High Score. Hope you Enjoy!

Note: It was created a few years ago when I first got a laptop capable of running Unity(2016). Decided to share it since I've been working on other projects and haven't had time to game dev. Hoping this will get me inspired again.
